body.name: Safety 1st Turn and Go 360 DLX Rotating All-in-One Car Seat, Provides 360¡ seat Rotation, High Street
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 26 mins
features: FULL 360° ROTATION The Turn and Go 360 DLX All-in-One Convertible Car Seat is designed with our innovative SafetySwivel 360° rotational technology that lets you turn the car seat, bringing you face-to-face with your little one as you buckle and unbuckle.

INSTALLATION SIMPLIFIED WITH SECURETECH Safety 1st’s innovative technology solves the most common installation problem 7 out of 10 parents unknowingly have: loose vehicle belt tension. Red-to-green visual indicators show when the seat belt has tension.

INTENTIONAL DESIGN MEETS EVERY STANDARD Meets or exceeds all federal safety standards and is National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) compliant. Attached connection cord ensures base and seat must be used together when installed.
GETTING A GOOD FIT IS QUICK AND EASY The Turn and Go 360 DLX All-in-One Convertible Car Seat also has a built-in vehicle belt lock-off arm that helps you get a tight fit during installation.
1-TIME BASE INSTALLATION FOR ALL 3 MODES Installation of the base is the same for all modes of use alleviating the need to re-install the car seat as your child grows.

EVERY AGE AND STAGE 360° rotation with soft locks to keep the seat secure when buckling in all 3 modes, birth to 10 years: rear-facing (5–40 lbs., 19"–40"), forward-facing (22–65 lbs., 29"–49"), and belt-positioning booster (40–100 lbs., 43"–52").
SecureTech Magnetic Chest Clip promotes struggle-free in-and-out buckling
MORE FEATURES TO LOVE 10-position headrest and harness adjust for every stage. 5-position recline.
body.description: The Turn and Go 360 DLX Rotating All-in-One Convertible Car Seat is designed with our innovative SafetySwivel™ 360 rotational technology that lets you turn the car seat toward you, bringing you face-to-face with your little one. This rotation makes buckling and transferring your child in and out of the seat easier than ever and puts less strain on your back. Our all-in-one car seat solves the number one installation problem that 7 out of 10 parents unknowingly have loose belt tension. Using SecureTech™, Safety 1st’s patent-pending tension-sensitive red-to-green indicators on the seat’s base, you can see when your belt has tension just look for the green! Turn-and-Go meets or exceeds all federal safety standards and is National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) compliant. The attached connection cord ensures that the base and seat must be used together when installed. The visual indicator for the top tether promotes proper tether usage. Installation of the base is the same for all 3 modes of use, alleviating the need to re-install the base as your child grows. Whether you’re bringing home your new arrival or taking your big kid to school, you’ll travel in confidence through all their stages, from birth to 10 years in all 3 modes: rear-facing (5–40 lbs. and 19”–40”), forward-facing (22–65 lbs. and 29”–49”), and belt-positioning booster (40-100 lbs. and 43”–52”).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a breeze
reviews.reviewText: This carseat is so perfect, i love how safely its rated but the best feature is the 360 degree rotation. My child used to hate getting in and out of the car, always fussy and often with tears and screaming and bucking… but this carseat the first time we used it was magical, the buckles are easier and more comfortable with a nonslip shoulder, and the fact that i can put her in and rotate it to place front or back is great. Love that it grows with her too. Im never buying another carseat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect car seat !
reviews.reviewText: Love the 360 rotationEasy to put my child in and out of the seat and with a click can rotate rear and front facing. Easy to clean. The only thing I’m not a fan of is how the cup holders pop off. My child loves to pop them on and off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh my gosh yes love it
reviews.reviewText: This is a great car seat I love it so much it is so easy to use I love it they only thing I don’t like it is not a light car seat so it can be hard carrying it to put in other vehicles but other than that I love it it is a great car seat and it grow with your child

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great car seat but it’s a little hard to turn but my son loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, comfort
reviews.reviewText: We love this car seat! Wish there was something like this for my older kids. It is a little difficult to install as far as making sure straps are tightened and everything in the right position but once you get it in it’s great. Swivels easily for me and I wear nails! My son is so much more comfortable in this seat he outgrew the base & car seat latch one at 5 months so we needed to find something quick but worth our $. This is it! The tilt feature is also great especially when he’s sleeping or having a bottle. If you’re looking for comfort at a decent price then get this seat for your littles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best car seat
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best car seat I’ve owned. It makes getting baby in and out of the car so much easier. The only downside is the base is bulky so doesn’t work too well in smaller vehicles with limited back seat space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I read all the reviews before purchasing this and here is my feedback:It is NOT one handed turn. It takes both hands and depending on your cars seat shape (bucket or flat) it will be difficult to turn.Installation is the same as any car seat. Awful. Took me 50 min start to finish.Features: adjustable recline- you will lose fingers doing this so pick a recline and leave it there permanently.The base itself is super sturdy, doesn’t move at all but the car seat itself after being locked into the base is VERY wobbly.Overall I don’t think it’s worth 300+ dollars…. Spend half and get the grow and go. Or spend the extra for one that has one handed turn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for newborn this is our second seat our 2 year old also in this seat easy to maneuver and adjust it is an extremely heavy carseat
